chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Karale Sanghir,
      p. 57â€”Aes Sedai
      of the Black Ajah, publicly of the Gray, form Arad Doman.  Her heart
      consists of herself, Atuan Larisett, and
      Marris Thornhill.  She has one Warder; he is a
      Darkfriend as well.
      See also
      Larisett, Atuan;
      Minly, Talene;
      Nerbaijan, Pritalle;
      Thornhill, Marris.
